text: Mike Harris (25 May 1939 â€“ 8 November 2021) was a South African racing driver. He took part in one World Championship Formula One Grand Prix in 1962. He was born in Mufulira, then-Northern Rhodesia. He won the 1962 Rhodesian Championship with his Cooper T53, powered by an Alfa Romeo engine. Harris died on 8 November 2021 in Durban, South Africa at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:South African racecar drivers Category:Formula One drivers
title: Mike Harris (racing driver)
